report.title: What? This spice does that much?
report.author: A.J.
report.bodytext: This was my first time trying nutmeg, i heard about it on the web and thought, what the hell. So i went to the supermarket and bought a nice sized box of whole nutmeg. /n /n Hour 1: Took entire tablespoon at 1 p.m., very hard stuff, hope it's worth it. Around 2 p.m. started feeling very stoned (but without the red eye and dry mouth!) /n /n Hour 2-4: feeling VERY stoned. sat and chilled out for a while. very light, calm hallucinations beginning. /n /n Hour 4-6: pretty nice closed eye visuals going on, very focused daydreams when i try. /n /n Hour 6-8: stoned feeling starting to subside, oh well. More closed eye visuals going on. At first i thought these may be acid flashbacks, but they are too unlike an LSD state of mind. /n /n Basically, the effects of hour 6-8 carried on until i went to bed. I woke up the next morning with a very pleasant buzz still going. Plus, i don't think i've had a better night's sleep. All in all the nutmeg was worth it. Not something i would do on a regular basis, but maybe just a lazy summer day experiment to try again. With proper music and state of mind, the nutmeg can be fun.
